data.title: 500 jobs at stake as Mota-Engil scales down
data.meta_description: At least 500 jobs are at stake following a decision by Portuguese multi-disciplinary conglomerate Mota-Engil Malawi to scale down operations at its Mkwinda Camp
data.text:
Summary by Ground News

At least 500 jobs are at stake following a decision by Portuguese multi-disciplinary conglomerate Mota-Engil Malawi to scale down operations at its Mkwinda Camp near Zalewa Trading Centre in Neno District. But in a written response yesterday, Mota Engil communications manager Thomas Chafunya could neither confirm nor deny the reports.
